page.title: 09DUNSCOMBE NEWTON ST. CYRES.
page.content: THOUGHTS ABOUT DUNSCOMBE BY RESIDENTS One opinion is that people are{not {generally friendly}in Dunscombe.One person felt that Dunscombe had not been designed well nor looked after properly.The housewife told us that {living at Dunscombe is hard work.}She often helps on the farm as well as doing her own chores.Dunscombe is a {quiet place}to live which residents like,although the dangerous main road is nearby. {The water supply comes from a {well.It is a nuisance to have to {remember to operate the electric pump {daily. One person from Dunscombe Cottages works on the farm,the others are either retired or work elsewhere. Fifteen people live at Dunscombe which is owned by the Downes Estate.
